DOC.brief_summary: PF-06342674 ( RN168 ) , develop treatment multiple sclerosis ( MS ) , antibody bind inhibits human interleukin-7 receptor , component potentially involved MS. PF-06342674 ( RN168 ) expect play role slow progression disease .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate The Safety And Tolerability Of PF-06342674 ( RN168 ) In Subjects With Multiple Sclerosis ( MS )
DOC.criteria: Women men age 1855 yr . Confirmed diagnosis Multiple Sclerosis ( MS ) accord 2010 revision McDonald Criteria . Expanded Disability Status Scale ( EDSS ) 05 , inclusive . Relapse episode MS within 2 week enrollment . Primary progressive MS without relapse component . Intolerant unwilling undergo MRI scanning . Treatment disease modify agent 6 week prior enrollment .
